player-settings.Name: Player Settings
player-settings.Label: Import / Export Player Settings
player-settings.Hint: Import and Export your player settings, based on player Names across worlds.

world.Name: World Settings
world.Label: Import / Export World Settings
world.Hint: Import and Export your world settings, including modules.

environment.importIntro: There is no import of the environment settings file as it is informational only. If you wish to import the modules you can do so by importing the World Settings.

settings.intro: Export world settings, including which modules are enabled/disabled.

import.playerList: Import settings for the following players:
import.notFound: The following users in the import file do not exist in this world and will be skipped.

export.playerList: Export settings for the following players:
